amendment.description: To facilitate rehabilitation efforts on the Kootenia and Flathead National Forests.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1772 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1772 proposed by Senator Burns. (consideration: CR S11816-11819; text: CR S11817) To facilitate rehabilitation efforts on the Kootenia and Flathead National Forests.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1772 proposed by Senator Burns.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1772 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
